label: Patient ID
description: unique identifier (automatically generated using sequential numbering + a user-code prefix)

label: Contact Name
description: First and last name of family member/contact/next of kin

label: Contact Phone
description: Mobile number for named family member/contact/next of kin

label: Patient Previous Ebola Test
description: Did patient receive Ebola test previous to IMC ETU admission?

label: Patient Previous Ebola Test Date
description: Date when previous Ebola test was administered

label: Name Of Lab
description: Name of laboratory where previous Ebola test was conducted

label: Triage Form Completed By
description: Name of clinician who completed triage form

label: Transport
description: Mode of transportation to IMC ETU

label: Patient Came From
description: Where patient was before coming to IMC triage

label: Where Was Patient Triaged
description: Where information to determine case definition was obtained

label: Ambulance Reference Number
description: Registration number of ambulance that transported patient to IMC ETC

label: Fever Number Days
description: Number of days fever has been present before triage

label: Anorexia
description: Self-reported anorexia/loss of appetite at triage

label: Bone/Muscle/Joint Pain
description: Self-reported bone or muscle pain at triage (does not include JointPain)+D39

label: Loss Appetite
description: Self-reported loss of appetite at triage

label: Photophobia
description: Self-reported sensitivity to light at triage

label: Bleeding
description: Self-reported bleeding from any site at triage (variable comes from various bleeding variables)

label: Bleeding - Gums
description: Self-reported bleeding from gums at triage

label: Bleeding - Injection
description: Self-reported bleeding from injection site at triage

label: Bleeding - Nose
description: Self-reported bleeding from nose at triage

label: Bleeding - Stool
description: Self-reported blood in stool at triage

label: Bleeding - Fresh Vomit
description: Self-reported fresh blood in vomit at triage

label: Bleeding - Digested Vomit
description: Self-reported digested blood in vomit at triage

label: Bleeding - Vagina
description: Self-reported vaginal bleeding other than menstruation at triage

label: Bruising - Skin
description: Self-reported bruising of skin at triage

label: Bleeding - Urine
description: Self-reported blood in urine at triage

label: Ebola Contact
description: Self-reported contact with a known or suspect case or sick person before becoming ill

label: Fluids
description: Self-reported contact with bodily fluids of sick person

label: Travel
description: Self-reported travel outside home village before becoming ill

label: Bush Meat
description: Self-reported contact with bush meat before becoming ill

label: Ill in Family
description: Reported illness in the family in the past 21 days

label: Visited Someone Ill
description: Reported visiting someone who has been ill in the past 21 days

label: Somebody Died Recently
description: Reported contact with someone who died in the past 21 days

label: Been to Funeral
description: Reported attendance to a funeral in the past 21 days

label: Suspicion Ebola
categoricalOpt2: Patient does not meet case definition

label: Bed Number Admitted
description: Ward and bed number where patient was at rounding (ward: S = Suspect, P = Probable, C = confirmed)

label: Laboratory Code
description: Code of laboratory where sample was tested

label: Time of Treatments
description: Time of day treatment was administered

label: ORS Dosage
description: Amount of ORS given to patient in mL

label: Cefixime Dosage
description: Amount of Cefixime given to patient

label: Coartem Dosage
description: Amount of Coartem given to patient

label: Paracetamol Dosage
description: Amount of Paracetamol given to patient

label: Omeprazole Dosage
description: Amount of Omeprazole given to patient

label: Vitamin A Dosage
description: Amount of Vitamin A given to patient

label: Vitamin C Dosage
description: Amount of Vitamin C given to patient

label: Multivitamins Dosage
description: Amount of Multivitamins given to patient

label: Zinc Sulphate Dosage
description: Amount of zinc sulphate given to patient

label: Ringers Lactate Dosage
description: Amount of Ringers Lactate given to patient in mL

label: Codeine Phosphate Dosage
description: Amount of Codeine Phosphate given to patient

label: Hatman Dosage
description: Amount of Hatman given to patient

label: Cetriaxone Dosage
description: Amount of Cetriaxone given to patient

label: Ondansetron Dosage
description: Amount of Ondansetron given to patient

label: Metoclopramide Dosage
description: Amount of Metoclopramide given to patient

label: Artemether Lumefantrine Dosage
description: Amount of Artemether Lumefantrine given to patient

label: Artesunate Dosage
description: Amount of artesunate given to patient

label: Artemether Dosage
description: Amount of artemether given to patient

label: Metronidazole Dosage
description: Amount of metronidazole given to patient

label: Ciprofloxacin Dosage
description: Amount of ciprofloxacin given to patient

label: Promethacin Dosage
description: Amount of promethacin given to patient

label: Tramadol Dosage
description: Amount of tramadol given to patient

label: Morphine Dosage
description: Amount of morphine given to patient

label: Diazepam Dosage
description: Amount of diazepam given to patient

label: Haloperidol Dosage
description: Amount of haloperidol given to patient

label: Chlorpromazine Dosage
description: Amount of chlorpromazine given to patient

label: Normal Saline Dosage
description: Amount of normal saline given to patient

label: Phosphate Infusion Dosage
description: Amount of phosphate infusion given to patient

label: Potasium Chloride Sodium Chloride
description: Potassium Chloride Sodium Chloride given to patient

label: Potasium Chloride Sodium Chloride Dosage
description: Amount of Potassium Chloride Sodium Chloride given to patient

label: Dextrose 5% Dosage
description: Amount of dextrose 5% given to patient

label: Provider Name
description: Name of clinician who completed rounding form

label: Bed Number
description: Ward and bed number where patient was at rounding (ward: S = Suspect, P = Probable, C = confirmed)

label: Wellness Scale
categoricalOpt1: 1 = Well: no symptoms: drinks and eats okay
categoricalOpt2: 2 = Few symptoms: drinks and eats okay
categoricalOpt3: 3 = Moderate symptoms: can walk, sit, and feed self
categoricalOpt4: 4 = Sick: needs help to be fed, drink, and take medications
categoricalOpt5: 5 = Very sick: needs IV fluids and medications, lots of help

label: Urine Frequency
description: Number of times patient reports urinating

label: Stool Frequency
description: Number of times patient reports passing stool

label: Patient Drink
description: How much did patient drink (text included)

label: Bone/Muscle/Joint Pain
description: Self-reported bone or muscle pain at rounding

label: Pain Behind Eye
description: Self-reported pain behind eye at rounding

label: Bleeding - Gums
description: Self-reported/observed bleeding from gums at rounding

label: Bleeding - Injection
description: Self-reported/observed bleeding from injection site at rounding

label: Haematuria
description: Self-reported blood in urine at rounding

label: Bleeding
description: Self-reported/observed bleeding from any site at rounding (variable comes from various bleeding variables)

label: Patient Randomized ZMAPP
description: Was this patient randomized to receive ZMAPP?

label: ZMAPP Treatment
description: Did this patient receive ZMAPP treatment today?

label: ZMAPP Today
description: If they did receive ZMAPP today, how much?

label: Exit Weight
description: Patient weight at discharge in kilograms

label: Disposition
description: Patient status at discharge (from daily patient line listings)
